speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: We did it once and now we will do it again, and this time we're going to finish the job, and this time should be a lot easier because we have done so much with our military, with our vets, with the Second Amendment, with our regulations, with the biggest tax cut in history, with getting rid of so many different problems, so many different things, including, by the way, the individual mandate in Obamacare, one of the worst things anybody's ever had to live through.
politifact_statement: We passed "the biggest tax cut in history."
verified_claim: We enacted the biggest tax cuts and reforms in American history.
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump wrong again that recent tax bill is biggest ever

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: And something I want to make clear to the media, we have among the cleanest and sharpest, crystal-clean, you've heard me say it, I went crystal-clean air and water anywhere on Earth.
politifact_statement: We have among the cleanest and sharpest crystal clean air and water anywhere on earth.
verified_claim: I want clean air. I want crystal clean water. And weve got it.Weve got the cleanest country in the planet right now.
verified_claim_article_title: No, the United States isn't the cleanest country
